metadata.title: AKS Container Running as Root
metadata.description: Detects containers explicitly configured to run as root user (UID 0).

properties.displayName: AKS Container Running as Root User
properties.description: Detects containers explicitly configured to run as root user (UID 0) or with runAsNonRoot set to false.
properties.query:
AzureDiagnostics
| where Category == "kube-audit"
| where TimeGenerated > ago(5m)
| extend log = parse_json(log_s)
| extend verb = tostring(log.verb)
| extend objectRef = log.objectRef
| extend requestObject = log.requestObject
| extend user = log.user
| where verb in ("create", "update", "patch")
| where objectRef.resource == "pods"
| extend containers = requestObject.spec.containers
| mv-expand container = containers
| extend securityContext = container.securityContext
| extend podSecurityContext = requestObject.spec.securityContext
| where 
    securityContext.runAsUser == 0 or
    podSecurityContext.runAsUser == 0 or
    securityContext.runAsNonRoot == false
| extend
    PodName = tostring(objectRef.name),
    Namespace = tostring(objectRef.namespace),
    ContainerName = tostring(container.name),
    ContainerImage = tostring(container.image),
    RunAsUser = coalesce(tostring(securityContext.runAsUser), tostring(podSecurityContext.runAsUser)),
    RunAsNonRoot = tostring(securityContext.runAsNonRoot),
    Username = tostring(user.username),
    ClusterName = Resource
| where Namespace !in ("kube-system", "gatekeeper-system", "azure-arc", "calico-system")
| project
    TimeGenerated,
    ClusterName,
    Namespace,
    PodName,
    ContainerName,
    ContainerImage,
    RunAsUser,
    RunAsNonRoot,
    Username
| summarize
    FirstSeen = min(TimeGenerated),
    LastSeen = max(TimeGenerated),
    Count = count()
    by ClusterName, Namespace, PodName, ContainerName, ContainerImage, RunAsUser, Username

alertDetailsOverride.alertDescriptionFormat: Container '{{ContainerName}}' in pod '{{PodName}}' is running as root user. This increases the risk of container escape.
